job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Sr Software Engineer to join our Cyber Defense team focusing on the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform. This platform will be instrumental in enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams, and play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy.

   What you will do

     * Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
     * Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
     * Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
     * Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
     * Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer - Cyber Defense

We are seeking a talented and experienced Sr Software Engineer to join our Cyber Defense team focusing on the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform. This platform will be instrumental in enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams, and play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy.

   What you will do

     * Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
     * Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
     * Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
     * Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
     * Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering and cybersecurity, with AI/ML mentioned as a tool to enhance existing processes rather than being the core focus of development. There is a lack of specific tasks related to building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models or predictive ML systems.

phrases: enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more
transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the business domain (cyber defense) and how technology, specifically AI, can be applied to achieve strategic goals within that domain.

phrases: Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews
job_tasks.justification: The core responsibilities involve designing, developing, and scaling software platforms and services, which are fundamental aspects of software development. Code reviews and mentoring also fall under this category.

phrases: Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
job_tasks.justification: This phrase shows an understanding of how AI can be used to achieve business objectives (transforming threat defense) and aligns with the business context.

phrases: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases explicitly mention collaboration with different teams and stakeholders to gather requirements and build solutions, highlighting communication and teamwork.

phrases: The security landscape is constantly evolving
soft_skills.justification: The description highlights the dynamic and challenging nature of the security landscape, implying a need for problem-solving and pragmatic solutions.

phrases: development of the next generation AI-powered security platform
architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions
soft_skills.justification: Phrases like 'next generation' and 'industry-leading' suggest a need for innovation and taking ownership of developing advanced solutions.

phrases: collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams
soft_skills.justification: Explicit mention of collaboration with various teams.

phrases: The security landscape is constantly evolving
soft_skills.justification: The mention of an evolving security landscape implies a need for continuous learning and adaptability.
